xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 12 Sekkhattika » 12.1 Paṭiccavāra » 12.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 12.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Sekkhattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
15.
1697Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1698Paccanīyaṃ.
